AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Boneweaver
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is practiced in the 'art' of Boneweaving. Sculpting sinew and bones of [PAWN_possessive] enemies into orcish fetishes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mud hand
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Although useful, sowing fields is looked down upon in orc culture. The bottom of the social hierarchy, [PAWN_nameDef] was spared from the meat pits by staving off his kin's hunger.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chanter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Gifted with an unusually wide snout, [PAWN_nameDef]'s bellowing grunts are put to use in orcish rituals and ceremonies.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dung pusher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found his place in orcish society as a respected dung pusher, keeping the meat pits filled.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: King
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] sheds a peerless musk of dominance. Lesser orcs shutter as steam bellows from his great snout. [PAWN_nameDef] spent his days growing bloated off of tribute and having weaker orcs expand his realm.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Den dweller
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Cowardly, and with no solid place in orc society, [PAWN_nameDef] survived the meatpits based on fear, wit, instinct, and knowing who to grovel to. For now.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tinkerer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: While ingenuity is the antithesis of orc culture, [PAWN_nameDef] has a nack for stumbling upon useful ideas. While not full appreciated by his peers, [PAWN_nameDef] was deemed useful enough to not be eaten.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Butcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: An envied position in orc society, [PAWN_nameDef]'s culinary skills and keen clever arm has granted [PAWN_objective] the honor of tending the meatpits.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Slave keeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s brutal nature and attention to details has landed [PAWN_objective] the lofty position of tending to orcish livestock.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bandit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Always an opportunist [PAWN_nameDef] made their way by preying upon farmsteads and lonely roadways, using simple traps and ambushes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rock scraper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: With nails as hard as steel, [PAWN_nameDef] was put work expanding tunnel networks of his clans burrows.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mud slapper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Tedious and thankless work, [PAWN_nameDef] made [PAWN_possessive] by way constructing crude siege works and forts for his clan.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Conquerer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Lusting for the exaltation of a burning capitals and crumbling fortresses, [PAWN_nameDef] carved a bloody path. A mere whisper of [PAWN_possessive] name inspired terror.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: City dweller
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: skulking in the waterways of a large town, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] clan lead a campaign of terror, emerging at night to hunt for prey before returning to the city depths.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ogrekin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was 'raised' by the terrifying Ogre tribes. Too much effort to kill, [PAWN_pronoun] lived off scraps before venturing out into the world.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Weathered
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born in the wild and left for dead, [PAWN_nameDef] clung onto life. subsisting off insects and roots until [PAWN_pronoun] was large enough to hunt.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Runt
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born the runt of his litter. Always dismissed by his clan, early life was a struggle but the experience hardened [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Misshapen
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with a malformed snout. Such oddities are revered in orc culture as a good omens, and [PAWN_pronoun] was favored by his clan.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Misshapen
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with massive tusks, killing his siblings in the womb. Such oddities are seen in orc culture as a omens of great and terrible things, and [PAWN_pronoun] was feared by his clan.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bloodborn
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born under a blood moon following a successful raid. Such oddities are seen in orc culture as omens of great conquests to come for the clan. [PAWN_pronoun] was drilled from youth to fulfill [PAWN_possessive] destiny.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gutter rat
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a city, being discarded into its waterways after birth. Subsisting on rats and what drifted through the sewer, [PAWN_nameDef] thrived in the dark.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Folktale
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent his youth terrorizing the countryside, stealing away farm animals and children in the night and leaving charms in their place. Tales were spun around these vanishings, and he became a local legend.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Demon spawn
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Even by orcish standards, [PAWN_nameDef] was seen as overly aggressive in his youth, participating in raids with orcs years his senior.
